description.ko: 기술이 생체 발광 생물의 고요한 아름다움을 관찰하는 바다 가장 깊은 곳에서의 빛과 물의 평화로운 춤입니다.
description.en: A peaceful dance of light and water in the deepest parts of the ocean, where technology observes the serene beauty of bioluminescent life.

prompt: Hyper-realistic cinematic shot of the AQUA-5 deep-sea research vessel navigating through the midnight zone. Bioluminescent flora of #40E0D0 turquoise and #48D1CC cyan illuminate the dark #000080 abyss. Translucent jellyfish with pulsing #006994 membranes drift past, their trails creating fluid dynamics of light. Bubbles rising, high-tech metallic finish on the vessel with glowing accents, 8k resolution, photorealistic textures, and a mysterious, serene underwater atmosphere.
